summary: A collection of example command‑line scripts that illustrate how to configure, train, evaluate, and run inference with NVIDIA NeMo token‑classification models for punctuation and capitalization, supporting both text‑only and multimodal (text + audio) inputs.
business_intent: Showcase the end‑to‑end workflow for building and deploying token‑classification models with NeMo, enabling developers to quickly prototype and benchmark punctuation and capitalization solutions for NLP applications.
